title: Paranoid Android Sapphire Beta is now available for more devices
content:
Over the last couple of months, the Paranoid Android team has released a bunch of Android 12-based alpha builds of the popular custom ROM. With each new build, the team has added new features to the custom ROM and extended support to more devices. The team showed us the first glimpse of Paranoid Android “Sapphire”

The post Paranoid Android Sapphire Beta is now available for more devices appeared first on XDA.
description: The Paranoid Android team is now rolling out Paranoid Android Sapphire Beta 1 to the OnePlus 7 Pro, 7T, 7T Pro, POCO F2 Pro, and the POCO F3.
